Reviews.Title: Same product, same performance
Reviews.Author: An ordinary consumer
Reviews.Content: I own the black version of this phone and you can find my in-depth review over here: BLU Studio 5.3 II Unlocked Dual Sim Phone with Dual-Core 1GHz Processor, Android 4.1, 5.3-inch IPS Capacitive Touch, and 8MP Camera - U.S. Warranty (Black)Well, after using it for couple weeks I've decided to order the white version too. The white version set has the same box and the same accessories as the black version (black charger, black USB able, black stereo earbuds with a mic on the cable, etc.). The only difference is the white plastic body with very cool chrome (plastic) elements that are not really visible on the product's photo but in real life add elegance and value to the image.There is no reason to repeat here everything what I've already covered in my review for the black version. It's all the same.By the way, this one has arrived from BREED if it matters for anyone.

Reviews.Title: the blu studio 5.3 11 unlocked phone is it
Reviews.Author: Godswill Oba Okpara
Reviews.Content: I want to state here that the blu studio 5.3 11 unlocked phone is wonderful, the actual performance of this phone is beyond expectation. I have used this phone for about five months, & it can be compared to Samsung Galaxy note 11. I recommend this phone to anybody that needs a phone that's not too expensive yet fantastic.

Reviews.Title: Great phone but no support
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Awesome phone...works like a charm! Only bad thing is can't find a cover or case for the phone and absolutely no customer service help to find one. Be careful the cover or case available on market is for Blu Studio 5.3 and not for 5.3 II (there is difference - camera is on different location on the back)

Reviews.Title: its good but
Reviews.Author: Alexandria P.
Reviews.Content: the piece that actually charges the phone came out  of the phone. total b.s. i could not have been more angry

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Judith A Sundell
Reviews.Content: This phone is a really good choice if you want a smart phone at a smart price.  It does everything I need it to do and more. Unexpectedly, I was really impressed with the quality of the pictures it takes.  I use it with free wifi and a pay-as-you-go phone service.  Because it is unlocked and I run without a service contract it costs me less than $75 per year for all of the phone services that I can use.  I have used it trouble-free for almost a year, and I am satisfied that it is a good value and a good quality phone.  Granted, I am retired and I have a very small social circle so my usage is relatively low.  That's why an unlocked phone works best for me.  But I love how the Android platform keeps my calendar and contact lists in sync across platforms including the phone, my graphics workstation, and my multiple laptops and tablet.  The only issue that bugs me is that the little mini-USB port is loose, which makes charging sometimes difficult because the charger keeps dropping out of the connection.  This is particularly annoying when I am trying to charge in the car and I can't keep looking at the charge light to see if the cable came loose.  Otherwise, I love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone with fast processor
Reviews.Author: Madie Park "green tea leaf"
Reviews.Content: So far so good. I purchased this phone about 2 weeks ago for my daughter as an inexpensive substitute for the Samsung note 2. She said the phones volume and picture quality is great, and no dropped calls nor freezes thus far. I was leery about taking a chance on this company that I was not familiar with, but as I stated originally...so far so good.

Reviews.Title: Best Buy for Big Phone
Reviews.Author: Victor B.
Reviews.Content: Excellent product!!! Fast and easy to handle.  Especially for customers new to smartphones & big touch screens.  And still impressive to experienced customers with hi tech phones.

Reviews.Title: RUDE OWNER....Talked to him myself!
Reviews.Author: tammi gilbert
Reviews.Content: I bought a BLI Studio 5.3 Unlock Dual Sim Phone with Dual Core 1 GHz processor (Android) from Top10Cell and the phone was defected, the sims card slot was defected for 174.30 and they stated they were only refunded me 138.59. After a few email conversations I called the company personally. I talked to the owner “Joe”, as he stated, of the company. This man was so rude to me actually very hateful. He was not concern with any of my complains. I told him that is outrageous because I order the phone from his company and it didn’t work properly and I got the short end of the stick (out of 35.00, paying to return the phone and no working phone actually no phone at all and the company has my 35.00 and the phone). I asked for him to fix the phone or send me a new one and he firmly stated he could not do that. I work in costumer services and the costumer is always right, so I have been told and I have never been talked to anyone as he talked to me. There was more to our conversation that I would not like to go into details but I will not recommend this company to anyone and educated my co-workers, colleagues, family and friends with this company. I really hope that every reads the reviews and listen to what happen and save the hassle, go to a different company. Talked with Amazon and they were wonderful!

Reviews.Title: Not bad, but ...
Reviews.Author: Shopper
Reviews.Content: I wanted to try this one out after having purchased the BLU Vivo 4,3. I admired the 5,3 my colleague purchased, and even bought one for my son. However, after comparing the 5.3 with my BLU Vivo 4,3, I preferred the latter, despite its smaller screen.BLUF: Larger screen is nice, and overall it's ok; I recommend the Vivo 4,3 instead.

Unlocked Dual SIM, 4GB storage; Android OS, v4.1 (Jelly Bean), Micro SD up to 32GB
5.3" High Resolution Display: qHD (540x960 pixels)
8MP Camera with LED Flash with HD recording (720p), 2MP Front Camera for Video Calling and instant self portraits.
3.5mm Audio Jack,FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
